items.content_html: ShuffleVids is both a web-based and an Electron-based video player that allows you to play your favorite videos directly from your computer. With ShuffleVids, you can shuffle the videos and play them in random order. The player is built using vanilla JavaScript and the Plyr library, making it lightweight and easy to use.
items.title: Krutik48/ShuffleVids2: ShuffleVids is both a web-based and an Electron-based video player that allows you to play your favorite videos directly from your computer. With ShuffleVids, you can shuffle the videos and play them in random order. The player is built using vanilla JavaScript and the Plyr library, making it lightweight and easy to use.
